Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I've used the terminal to clear some of the caches. I'll do a more thorough checkup later, so just stay here and don't move.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Regardless of what Commandant thinks, you've been pushing yourself too hard recently, Liv.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You carry everything on your shouldersâ€”combat, preparations, even Commandant's documents were taken care of by you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I know we're Constructs, but we still need some time off for ourselves. The way you've been going...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can take care of myself!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Right, Commandant, I'll leave this to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you leaving?', 3: '14', 4: "I'll try my best.", 5: '15'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is a tactical retreat...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't let me down.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm sorry... for losing my temper in front of you, Commandant. I'll write a review report...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is this actually about?', 3: '19', 4: 'Why are you forcing yourself to work?', 5: '19'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't want you to think of me as someone weak... b-but...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm scared that the war will end...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Isn't the ending of the war a good thing?", 3: '23', 4: 'Do you want the war to continue?', 5: '24'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Of course it's a good thing. There will be no more deaths, no more crying...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Of course not... but I'm scared...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Since the Punishing Virus appeared and the war broke out...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've been in a repeating cycle of loss and gain, and gradually, I've started to get used to this loop...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And every time I'm by myself, I'll close my eyes, and I'll wonder...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Who will I be when the war is over...? If I don't stop working, I won't need to question myself...", 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll think about that when the time comes.", 3: '30', 4: "We'll search for the answer then. Together.", 5: '30'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But when the time comes...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant's right. We might have been created for war, but we don't have to stay in it forever.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But it's still too far away to think about where we'll go when the war ends...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Instead of the distant future, I'm more interested in what we can do, what we want to do, here and now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So, Liv, what do you want to do at this moment?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I... want to stay by Commandant's side.", 4: '1'}
